not_user: Please fill in your account in the settings
input_large_25: The string should be no more than 25 characters long
input_english_check: The string should contain only English letters and numbers
username_rules: Username must be from 3 to 20 characters and contain only english letters and one number
password_rules: Password must be from 6 to 20 characters and contain one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number
color_rules: Color must have at least 7 characters
